body.name: Smart Watch for Men Women(Dial/Answer Calls), Activity Trackers with Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, 112 Sports Modes/IP68 Waterproof, 1.85" HD Touchscreen Fitness Watch Compatible with Android iOS, Blue
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 46 mins
features: Stay Connected on the Go: Introducing the Ddidbi Smartwatch with Built-in Speaker, allowing you to Answer Calls and Enjoy Music right on your wrist. With message notifications and social media alerts (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc.), all displayed and vibrating reminders on your wrist, you can keep your phone in your pocket without missing any important calls or messages while walking or exercising. Get your ultimate companion today!

Unleash Your Style: Our watches features a 1.85-inch high-resolution touch screen, providing an exceptional visual and operational experience. The screen brightness is adjustable, ensuring clear readability of time and data even in bright lighting conditions. Additionally, the smart watches application offers a selection of over 200+ personalized watch face wallpapers, and you can even customize your watch face with your favorite photo and showcase your unique style.

Smarter Living at Your Fingertips: This fitness tracker offers a multitude of everyday essential features waiting for you to explore, including alarm clock, stopwatch, music control, weather forecast, sedentary reminders, breathing exercises, find phone, camera control, and more. Seamlessly pairing with most iOS 9.0 and Android 5.0 and later smartphones (Not for PC, iPad, and Tablet), it becomes an integral part of your daily life, offering unparalleled functionality and convenience.

Track Your Triumphs: Our sports watch offers 100+ sports modes, covering walking, running, cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, soccer, yoga, and more, catering to almost all sports enthusiasts. It diligently records your exercise data, tracking steps, heart rate, calories, and distance. With its IP68 waterproof rating, you can confidently wear it even in rainy weather, swim, or sweat during workouts without any concerns about functionality.

Ready to Roll: The watches for men boasts a 300mAh large-capacity, energy-efficient battery design, easily rechargeable with the included magnetic charger. With regular usage, it offers an impressive battery life of around 7 days, extending up to 20 days in standby mode. Tailor your experience by customizing the brightness, vibration, and wrist wake-up settings to suit your preferences. For initial use, please charge the watch fully for approximately 2 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as good if not better than my Garmin and Fitbit
reviews.reviewText: I love this watch. It's very user friendly.I've had it for 10 days connected via bluetooth the entire time and it just now needs charging.It has all the features I need and many more. The best part is the phone call function. I was blown away at the volume and clarity of the sound of the calls.The heartrate, Spo2 and step count features are all extremely accurate as I have checked them while wearing other devices and they are pretty spot-on. The sleep tracker was close but, needs improvement.I purchased this watch when my Garmin died and this was supposed to fill in while I did my normal month long research before buying my next name brand smartwatch. I am so pleased with this watch I'm not getting another. This is the one!And you cant beat the price!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A shockingly decent little smartwatch for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I really am impressed with this little watch. It looks great and works far better than I was expecting. Sure it isn't a 400 dollar Samsung smart watch or an apple watch, but for the price that's paid, this makes a GREAT pedometer to track your steps, and it works great for checking in on your sleep, ESPECIALLY because the battery last like 4 or 5 days!!! It way outlasted my samsung and I was able to see how my sleep was each night instead of having to charge the watch like I do my samsung.With the app, you have a pretty decent choice of fun faces. The app has some other data tracking features that can be useful.It came with 2 watch bands, which I changed to the other one it provided right away as I liked it better. But the bands are comfortable. I have had no discomfort at all.It does a great job of relaying your texts to you. You don't get to type a reply back, but have you ever tried texting on a watch? But it is great to have the texts show up and easy to read. It also has the ability if you set up your phone, you can shake your watch to take the picture. That's pretty awesome. I also like that you can use it as a transmitter for google assistant. I have my house set up to use google assistant so I can just turn my lights on and off by talking to the watch. It can be used as a speakerphone or just play music through it.Overall I found a lot of function in this watch at this price. I was actually very surprisingly pleased with it. It's not gonna compete with a 400 dollar watch, but this is a fantastic little fitness and sleep tracker with other features as well. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a smartwatch full of features
reviews.reviewText: Coming from Fitbit I wasn't sure what to expect but after yet another Fitbit broke I was ready to give this one a try and I'm glad I did. There are so many features Fitbit doesn't have but this one offers I'm happy. Things I love: feature to find your phone with your watch, you can have pictures as a background, voice assistant, it shows you the weather even days out, it tracks sleep and steps (Yes you don't get a sleep score like Fitbit but I'm okay with it for all these other features), place calls, show contacts, show messages (Fitbit only does text messages this one shows all messages app you choose like WhatsApp and Facebook) and you can play music. It's a great smart watch for the price!! Only downsize is that the screen is big if you have a small arm like me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET THIS WATCH
reviews.reviewText: Ever since my trusty old 205L watch finally gave out, I have been searching for a reasonable smartwatch to replace it. I have kissed a lot of frogs in the process, but finally, this watch fits the bill. The battery life is good, the app is easy to use, and there are lots of watch faces to select from. The step counter and heart rate monitor are also very accurate. You'll love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fitness watch
reviews.reviewText: I have owned a few fitness watches. I was not sure what to expect with one at this price. Let me just say, I have been pleasantly surprised.So far, I haven't run into anything I don't like about this watch. I love the big screen. I can easily read the information on it, and there are many watch faces to choose from. You can even have a picture on it. I like that I can choose one that tells me the temperature.This watch also has tons of fitness activities you can choose from to record your workout. I would say that whatever activity it is that you enjoy, it's very likely to be on the list.I also like the various other features that have been included. Not only can you receive text messages on it, but you can also use it to talk on the phone, play music on it, or even use it to snap a picture from your phone!I also like the app you use with this watch. It provides me with all the information I need. I like that it tells me not only how many steps I've walked, but the approximate miles I've walked, too. My last fitness watch didn't. Now, it may not give me a sleep score (which I don't really need), but it does show me my deep sleep, light sleep and time awake, and also shows it laid out in a timeline that I can actually read on my phone without my reading glasses. I actually needed reading glasses to read that for my last watch, and even then it was hard to read.So far this has proven to be a great watch. I'm extremely happy with it, and extremely happy that I decided to try it out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Para lo que cuesta es un chollo
reviews.reviewText: El reloj es bonito. Bastante intuitivo. Es ligero. Tamaño de la pantalla adecuado. Buen contraste que permite verlo en el exterior. La batería dura entre una semana y 10 días, según lo que lo toquetees. Tiene bastantes modos deportivos. Resistente al agua y monitoriza tanto oxígeno como sueño, además de cuentapasos. Las notificaciones y uso con el teléfono van correctos. Sin duda lo mejor es el precio. Importante; hay que instalar la app para configurar todas las actividades y revisar toda la actividad. Por lo poco que cuesta una pasada.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch a couple of days ago, and so far it has been running smoothly. Great charge, lasted me a few days before it needed to charge again. It came with an extra strap and a magnetic charger which attaches attaches the back of the watch. It can connect to your phone via an app and has lots of good features like weather, step tracking, heart rate, blood oxygen and also breathing exercises. It has a customisable watch face with many to choose from. A good fit also, I recommend it!

I purchased this watch based on the many great reviews and was not disappointed. It has a really exquisite appearance and is quite easy to wear. The price-performance ratio is unrivaled. The hammer is the extremely long battery life. I have 30% battery left after two weeks. As with most smartwatches, all functionalities are present. The display is quite easy to read. The watch is quite durable. I even ordered a second one as a last-minute birthday present. Overall, I'm extremely pleased with the watch.

Quest’orologio è semplicemente fantastico!Consegna puntualissima, come da programma.Esteticamente è molto bello ed elegante, può essere indossato in qualsiasi occasione anche perchè all’interno è presente un cinturino di ricambio (uno semplice ed elegante mentre l’altro è casual/sportivo).Entrambi i cinturini, sono neri e sono di una sorta di silicone molto morbido e comodo.Cambiare i cinturini è molto semplice.Basta sganciarli con due piccole leve apposte in entrambi i pezzi dei cinturini ed il gioco è fatto.Il display è semplicissimo, quadrato con gli angoli arrotondati ed è presente un unico pulsante al lato per attivare lo schermo. Ma è presente anche la funzione di movimento per attivarlo, che trovo molto comoda.Un altro pregio da non sottovalutare è che una volta indossato ti dimentichi di averlo, è molto leggero.Le funzionalità sono INFINITE!- Battito cardiaco- Sonno- Contapassi- Registro distanza percorsa- Calcolo calorie bruciate- Meteo- Pressione arteriosa- Ossigeno nel sangue- Sport- Notifiche per messaggi- Ricevere e effettuare chiamate (registrando però un massimo di 100 contatti)- Ascoltare la musica (ovviamente essendo collegati al cellulare con il bluethoot)- Assistente vocale- Cronometro- Timer- Potete scegliere se far riprodurre i suoni del telefono, ad esempio mentre scrivete un messaggio o guardate un video (funzionalità attivabile o meno)- Cambiare il tema di visualizzazione delle varie funzioni (nelle impostazioni)- Cambiare la schermata di visualizzazione dell’ora (cambiabile velocemente tenendo premuta la schermata e scorrendo)Tramite l’app potete, oltre a controllare tutti i dati registrare fino a quel momento:- Attivare le notifiche per altre app, io ad esempio ho attivato whatsapp in modo da ricevere messaggi sullo smartwach- Effettuare la ricerca dell’orologio tramite l’app se lo perdete- Cambiare il tema della schermata di visualizzazione dell’ora sia impostando immagini predefinite nell’app, sia caricando una foto che avete nel telefono- Impostare una sveglia- Impostare una vibrazione ogni tot di tempo se state troppo sedutiSull’app comunque potrete trovare tutte le informazioni e impostazioni necessarie (il nome dell’app si può trovare nel foglio di istruzioni e anche nell’orologio tramite il QR CODE).Anche la batteria dura molto, circa 5 giorni, poi dipende ovviamente da quanto lo usate e cosa ci fate.E mi sembra inutile parlare del rapporto qualità prezzo, per 20,99€ tutto questo, non me l’aspettavo davvero.Sono veramente contenta di quest’acquisto, straconsiglio!

reviews.reviewTitle: Smartwatch molto bello di impatto e multifunzionale
reviews.reviewText: Ciao a tutti, ho acquistato questo smartwatch (l’ennesimo) con la speranza di trovare un prodotto versatile, e devo dire che non sono rimasto deluso. Il display molto ampio offre una chiara visibilità, rendendo comode le operazioni, in particolare la gestione delle chiamate direttamente dal polso.Apprezzo molto l'inclusione di due cinturini, che aggiungono un tocco di personalizzazione al design. La possibilità di scambiarli facilmente è un grande vantaggio per adattare l'orologio a diverse occasioni.Le funzioni telefoniche sono efficienti, consentendo di effettuare e rispondere alle chiamate in modo rapido. Ovviamente, la valutazione complessiva dipende dalle prestazioni generali del dispositivo nel tempo.In sintesi, questo smartwatch rappresenta un ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo per chi cerca versatilità e funzionalità in un orologio intelligente.Spero possa esservi utile 🤗
